author: gregor
msg: Made sure links sent by notification emails are proxied, if appropriate. Patch by Simon Litwan, this resolves http://issues.apache.org/bugzilla/show_bug.cgi?id=35287

author: sylvain
msg: Fix multithreading problems that led background threads to share the environment stack of http threads, thus leading to
recycling components of the background thread when the http thread finishes the request processing.
